participant_1.background:
I'm feeling a little chilly because the weather is cold.
I do my best to keep up with my family, although it's hard to stay connected with everyone when you're working all the time.
my glasses are held together by tiger printed duct tape.
I'm lucky to have such a great dog to share my life with.
I'm an avid reader of sci-fi space adventures looking for new ways to learn.

participant_2.background:
I like to read fiction to escape from the criticism of my family.
i love romantic comedies.
i have 10 years experience in our industry , yet she gets promoted.
I bought a bouquet of daisies for my wife on our anniversary.
I enjoy a variety of foods, but my favorite is probably chocolate.

content.text: Howdy, how are you doing today?
Hi there! I am doing well. How about yourself?
I am doing well, thanks for asking.
I am glad to hear that.
So, what are some of your interests?
I love to read, especially fiction. It helps me escape from the criticism of my family.
That's great! I love to read as well. What kind of fiction do you like to read?
I like to read romantic comedies and sci-fi space adventures.
Those sound like fun reads! I like to read a variety of things, but I am a big fan of sci-fi and fantasy.
Me too! I love the way that sci-fi and fantasy can take me to a different world.
Me too! It's so much fun to be able to escape from reality for a little while.
I agree! What are some of your favorite sci-fi and fantasy books?
I have a lot of favorites, but some of my all-time favorites include Dune, The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, and The Lord of the Rings.
Those are all great choices! I have read all of those books and I loved them all.
Me too! They are all so well-written and they are so much fun to read.
I agree! I am glad that we have similar interests.
Me too! It is always nice to meet someone who enjoys the same things that you do.
It is! We should talk more sometime.
